tbCheckboxField component in tubular.directives

The tbCheckboxField component represents a checkbox field.

It uses the TubularModel to retrieve column or field information.

Component's attributes

Param Type Details
name string

Set the field name.
value object

Set the value.
checkedValue object

Set the checked value.
uncheckedValue object

Set the unchecked value.
isEditing boolean

Indicate if the field is showing editor.
showLabel boolean

Set if the label should be display.
label string

Set the field's label otherwise the name is used.
help string

Set the help text.
